🌻 [HIGH QUALITY] This flatware set is made of high quality 18/0 stainless steel, rust resistance and healthy for daily use. Easy clean and dishwasher safe.

🌻 [ELEGANT DESIGN] Mirror polished surface, smooth edges no rough spots, nice with a good length and proper weight, these tableware utensils provides a comfortable grip for both adults and big children.
🌻 [FUNCTIONAL] Perfect for any formal or informal occasions, such as home, hotels, restaurants, gathering, parties, wedding, picnics, camping, etc.
🌻 [GUARANTEE] We have a commitment to each customer 100% satisfaction. If you have any problem about our products, just contact us any time you feel comfortable.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This flatware set is made of high quality 18/0 stainless steel that ensures safety and durability, they are rust resistant and durable for daily use. Simple and elegant design makes it suitable for any formal or informal occasions, such as home, hotels, restaurants, wedding, gathering, parties, picnics, camping, etc. If you are searching for a modern and unique silverware set, then go for Wildone 20-Piece Silverware Set, you won't regret it.
Package Includes: 4 x Dinner Forks, 4 x Salad Forks, 4 x Dinner Knives, 4 x Dinner Spoons, 4 x Teaspoons

Why Choose This Silverware Set? Made of quality stainless steel, rust free, sturdy and durable for daily use. Mirror polished surface and smooth edge with no rough spots, proper gauge thickness and weight to hold comfortably. This set offers a modern look bringing elegance to the dinner table for your family and guests. It would be a wonderful gift for wedding, housewarming, Thanksgiving, Christmas, Birthday or other festivals. USING INSTRUCTION Please wash the flatware set with warm soapy water before first using to wash off any processing residue left from manufacturing.Please clean and dry the silverware set after using for your daily use, and store in dry place for its durability.Please do not use any harsh detergents, steel wool, scouring pads to clean the flatware set.

A beautiful set of flatware, features a nice curve and modern style. Smooth surface that ensures the safety of your lips and it’s suitable for eating with. Our fancy fork knife and spoon set is a great addition to your table settings, perfect for home daily use. Ergonomic handles with simple look and nice weight, luxury enough to make your table settings elegant and different. Our eating utensils provides a good grasp for both adults and big children. A perfect and wonderful present for weddings, housewarming, Thanksgiving, Christmas, Birthday, etc. It's a great choice as a gift for lovely family and friends on different festivals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We wanted black silverware to match our house decor. These have been great so far after 2 months. They look great and have a pretty sturdy feel. Would buy again especially at this price point

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value flatware!
reviews.reviewText: These are a very good value. They weren't exactly the color that I had envisioned, but they do match, so they work perfectly. I was slightly nervous when I saw the packaging that I had ordered disposable or something by accident, but they actually look and feel very nice considering how cheap they are. Considering ordering a second set. Great value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love that they came in the color black they're very nice I've used them the clean very good and so far dishwasher safe

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value but larger spoon is BIG
reviews.reviewText: This set was a great value but the bigger size spoons are BIG. They look kind of ridiculous and my younger kids avoid them. My almost teenager said he likes them for cold cereal. I use them more for serving spoons. I like the feel and weight of these. My old set had heavy handles and would tip over a light bowl. This set is not like that but still feels sturdy. Overall I like it but wish the large spoon wasn't so big that's why I only have it 4 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great items for taller folks
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for utensils for the "giant" in your family, these are it. I got these to supplement a set I already had and sadly these are completely different so didn't quite fit the bill. The largest spoon (soup spoon) is huge. It is the exact size of my serving spoon from a older set and the dinner fork tines are as long as my pinky. This would not be an issue but I am 5 ft 3 and everything except my fat fingers are rather small, short and stubby so this fork would probably do me some damage. The smaller salad fork is the same size as my regular dinner fork from another set. I am not saying this is a bad set it is just not meant for petite people. My 6' 3" brother in law would, however, feel much more comfortable with this set. It is beautifully made and a bit heavy so great quality which is why I rate a 5 regardless of my inability to use 1/2 of the set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality meets value
reviews.reviewText: These are just basic black flatware. Nothing special. You don't feel the coating like on a lot of black flatware. These are the same style as my gold set which ended up losing almost all of its coating after a few months. Overall I can eat with them and that's what counts

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a replacement for our old mismatched silverware but I wanted something different. I bought both the black set and the copper set. They are both great! It feels great in the hand not cheap or flimsy. The finished has held up nicely. My husband washes his cereal spoon right after eating every day. I got both so if can be mixed and matched for special occasions and be really unique. I love how large the salad forks are and my husband likes the large spoons. Mind you, the big fork and spoons are larger than normal and the small is just smaller than your average large. Even our daughter likes the new silverware. The butter knives can really cut, you can see the serrated edge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely Beautiful, so well made
reviews.reviewText: I needed these for a indoor picnic at a hotel and they were perfect , much heavier and well made than I expected very beautiful set!

reviews.reviewerName: Alway great quality, and the bag lasts for ages.
reviews.reviewText: Very nice quality, heavy feel. Wish the stems were a little bit bigger but tiger wise perfect
Is what it is…. Somewhat lightweight but certainly are good and do the job. You won’t find these in grandma’s china cabinet but let’s face it… pretty tough to make a bad spoon.
La table était parfaite avec ces ustensiles
